alert.note: Alert for Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 11:12PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ST. HELENA, NORTHWESTERN ST. TAMMANY, NORTHERN TANGIPAHOA AND WASHINGTON PARISHES, WALTHALL AND SOUTHERN PIKE COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT CST... At 1112 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tylertown to near Montpelier. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklinton, Greensburg, Amite, Amite City, Kentwood, Independence, Tylertown, Roseland, Folsom, Osyka, Montpelier, Mount Herman, Wilmer, Dexter, and Tangipahoa. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 41 and 66. Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
